amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds appropriated in the bill from being provided to any institution of higher education that prevents ROTC access to, or military recruiting on, its campus.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 22 in the Congressional Record of contracts to universities and colleges that bar ROTC and military recruiters access to the general student population.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
